project_plan.name: Text-Based Adventure Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where players can navigate through rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Design the game structure with rooms and navigation
Implement room functionality and item placement
Create inventory management system for the player
Implement mechanics for picking up and using items
Design and implement simple challenges (e.g., riddles, puzzles)
Write tests for all implemented features including room navigation, item management, and challenges
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
